name: Vox (itch) (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Patrick Strassen - Tynesoft Computer Software. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

You have to defend the 4 Cities of the planet "VOX" from the alien invasion force. You must destroy the alien craft by moving a sight over the screen and firing guided missiles to sight's location. There are 3 levels. Each level consist of a set number of alien craft but an unlimited number of ammo Saucers and Stunt Planes. To complete a level you must destroy 10 alien bombs.

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: A  
Move: Cursor keys
Fire: A 

Start the game: Z
Move: Arrow keys
Fire: Z 

 

Vox - Tynesoft
